TopicTitle: KSP is referenced in today's XKCD(again)

Articles.Content:
Every thing is in the title.

In today's comic you can "change" the comic by making new choices, with this one you will notice the reference(assuming you crashed at least once).

http://xkcd.com/1350/#p:c4de442a-b9ea-11e3-8002-002590d77bdd
That was hilarious. I did not see it coming!
Yep, that's a KSP addict if I ever saw one.

1, http://xkcd.com/1350/

2, silly tiles!

3, 4096!

4, three clones?!

5, bigger rockets!!

6, rendezvous!

7, ??????????????????

8, profit!
I figured today has to have some sort of Easter Egg, since it's a repeat of yesterday's with different page formatting. But maybe it's me, or my browser, but I don't see what it is.

I don't get it, whatever choice I make it prints that in the speech bubble and then says 'suggestion submitted, meanwhile explore other choices' and from there I can go back to look at the same four choices but nothing else comes up.

I don't get it, whatever choice I make it prints that in the speech bubble and then says 'suggestion submitted, meanwhile explore other choices' and from there I can go back to look at the same four choices but nothing else comes up.

It looks like the comic was only for April 1st...
Not working in either Firefox or IE for me. I see that others have said the same on the xkcd forum: http://forums.xkcd.com/viewtopic.php?t=108518&p=3561606
Wow, now it works. Something's bugging out with it

There seems to be a whole bunch of ksp references in that rocket flight scene.

-you're not even controlling this, you're just playing ksp.

-sorry, I'm about to land on Mun, hold on a second!
